greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Binary width of terms produced by match-making permutation: a(n) = A070939(A266195(n)).
comment: Each n occurs A000079(n-1) = 2^(n-1) times in total.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2694
xref: Cf. A266186 (where n first appears, most likely also the positions of records).
Cf. A266197 (gives numbers n where a(n) = a(n+1)).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 26 2015
